content.p: The Section role represents a vertical column or set of columns in a Relation
Section does the Positional (array) role to access Tuples (rows). For more information, see Lists, sequences, and arrays.
That means the following are possible:

div.code: $surname = $surname[$row-number]; # Fetch cell contents by row $surname[$row-number] = $value; # Set cell contents by row

content.p: Returns the section data dictionary entry, probably from the Data Dictionary (though not necessarily in the case of a Field from a TupleSet). This could be a single entry (for a Field), or an array of entries (for a Lot).
